title: How to Sign Out of Windows 10

steps.title: Launch the Start menu.
steps.content: Launch the Start menu. Click the Start button located at the bottom-left of the screen. [1] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source Alternatively, press the ⊞ Win keyboard key.

steps.title: Click the user profile icon.
steps.content: Click the user profile icon. A context menu will appear. Newer versions of Windows 10 will have it towards the bottom-left of the menu. Older versions will have it at the top-left along with your username.

steps.title: Launch the Power User menu.
steps.content: Launch the Power User menu. Press the ⊞ Win + X keys together. [2] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source Alternatively, right-click the Start button. Touchscreen device users can hold down and release.

steps.title: Hover over/select Shut down or sign out.
steps.content: Hover over/select Shut down or sign out . This option is located second from the bottom. Choosing this will prompt a submenu to appear to the right of the main context menu. You can also press the U keyboard key.

steps.title: Click Restart.
steps.content: Click Restart . Pressing the I (letter i) keyboard key will perform the same action as clicking Restart .

steps.title: Navigate to the desktop.
steps.content: Navigate to the desktop. Press ⊞ Win + D simultaneously. There are other different ways of doing this: Close all open apps . Use the ✕ button. Clicking the very bottom-right of the screen, on the taskbar.

steps.title: Open the "Shut Down Windows" dialog box.
steps.content: Open the "Shut Down Windows" dialog box. Press Alt + F4 together. [3] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source Pressing the keys together while an app is displayed will cause the window to close.

steps.title: Click the dropdown menu.
steps.content: Click the dropdown menu. It's right below the "What do you want the computer do do?" line of text.

steps.title: Confirm that you want to sign out.
steps.content: Confirm that you want to sign out. Press OK or hit ↵ Enter .

steps.title: Access the Windows Security Screen.
steps.content: Access the Windows Security Screen. Press the Ctrl + Alt + Del keys together. A blue screen containing many different links and icons should appear.

steps.title: Click or tap on "Sign out" from the list of links.
steps.content: Click or tap on "Sign out" from the list of links.
